summary: Abu Dhabi is the capital and the second-largest city of the United Arab Emirates (UAE). It's located on an island in the Persian Gulf. The city is an important political and economic center, housing government offices and a large sovereign wealth fund. With a population of around 2.5 million, it has developed quickly due to oil and gas production, becoming a modern, wealthy metropolis. Abu Dhabi contributes significantly to the UAE's economy and is known for its culture and commerce.
title: Abu Dhabi
